title: Middle distance running; hurdling; the sprint
creator_credit: Brian Clarkson, Alan Smith and Queensland. Dept. of Education
brief_description: Middle-distance running” is designed to motivate the young to run, with emphasis on a training program that won’t burn the young athlete out. “Hurdling’ and “The Sprint” present a guide to correct technique, and training routines designed to reinforce these skills.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Clarkson, Alan Smith and Queensland. Dept. of Education
